About fifty men registered in the
training class for counselors last
week in Remsen 101. Because of the
size of the class, Reuben Baer, instructor of the group, has decided to
divide it into two sections, one to meet
on Wednesday afternoons at 4:15, the
other to meet one evening a week—
probably Wednesday at 7 o'clock.

sections will be Wednesday, February 13, Mr. Baer announced. He has
designed the class to cover all phases
of camp duty, including theory as
well as actual practice.
